content: Azure Artifacts is a service provided by Azure DevOps that enables teams to create, host, and share packages (such as libraries or executables) with other team members and projects within an organization. It provides integrated package management with support for various package types including Maven, npm, Python, and NuGet. Azure Artifacts allows teams to manage their package versions, control access to packages, and enforce security policies. It also offers features such as caching, proxies, and retention policies to help optimize package management and improve build times. Overall, Azure Artifacts helps simplify the management and distribution of packages across the development lifecycle.
